page.title: 09INTERVIEW WITH A GREENGROCER
page.content: Q:How long has this shop been here? A:Four years Q:How many people do you get in a week ? A:It varies-about 1500 per day Q:Who is your supplier ? A:Southampton Market and local farms Q:Has business improved ? A:Yes-because of the easy parking Q:How often do you get supplies in ? A:We keep food as fresh as possible and for as long as possible Q:What sort of fruits do people buy here ? A:Fresh,local grown food and Cape fruit Q:How many people are employed in this shop ? A:Five women who work on a rota and two full-time workers
